backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping implemented UI pages and components to requirements and evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining root design tokens and dark mode overrides using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with Home, Intake, and Billing routes and applies a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking params.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo and navigation links for Intake and Billing, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages creating and refreshing the backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme using teal and green healthcareâ€‘styled OKLCH variables with dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Billing.tsx: Billing page UI with header, feature cards for invoices, payments, claims, reports, and a security info panel.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page with hero section, navigation links to Intake and Billing, service descriptions, and a hero image.
frontend/src/pages/Intake.tsx: Intake page UI with header, cards for patient info, scheduling, contacts, communication, and a getting-started panel.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, assets, and current build state for the healthcare website.
